Text:
This is not a DVD Screen, it is a TS cam capture. It is the best TS I've seen of this movie, but it is still a TS with blown out highlights and too dark in other places.

The Audio is that horrible line-audio feed that has no signal under 100hz. Very treble, very bad. In addition the audio is mono, not stereo.

This is the best TS out there, but it is still not even close to a DVD.

this torrent came from axxo site check if you want sorry if it is a TS but i am only passing it on and putting what it said on axxo`s site
